bio.para: Grew up on a farm, encouraged to the service of Sarenrae by the local priest.
Has adventured in service of the church for a year and now is looking to form an adventuring party to hunt through the Vericostial catacombs for undead that have been snatching citizens.

deity.name: Sarenrae
deity.description: Goddess of the sun, redemption, honesty, healing
deity.domainlist: Agathion Subdomain, Day Subdomain, Fire, Glory, Good, Healing, Heroism Subdomain, Light Subdomain, Restoration Subdomain, Resurrection Subdomain, Sun
deity.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.91

skills.list_mods: Diplomacy +10, Heal +10, Intimidate +5, Knowledge (Planes) +4, Knowledge (Religion) +4, Linguistics +4, Sense Motive +8, Spellcraft +4

item.name: Backpack
item.contents: 9.5 lbs., 2 Amethyst, 1 10 Bolts, 1 Citrine, 10 Gold Piece, 5 Platinum Piece, 10 Silver Piece, 1 Light Crossbow, 1 Potion of Cure Light Wounds, 4 Trail Ration

item.name: Light Horse (Combat Trained)
item.contents: 43 lbs., 1 Military Saddle, 1 Waterskin, 1 Bedroll, 1 Winter Blanket, 1 10 Bolts

item.name: Military Saddle
item.special_properties: +2 circumstance bonus on Ride checks related to staying in the saddle

item.name: Backpack
item.contents: 9.5 lbs., 2 Amethyst, 1 10 Bolts, 1 Citrine, 10 Gold Piece, 5 Platinum Piece, 10 Silver Piece, 1 Light Crossbow, 1 Potion of Cure Light Wounds, 4 Trail Ration

item.name: Light Horse (Combat Trained)
item.contents: 43 lbs., 1 Military Saddle, 1 Waterskin, 1 Bedroll, 1 Winter Blanket, 1 10 Bolts

item.name: Military Saddle
item.special_properties: +2 circumstance bonus on Ride checks related to staying in the saddle

feat.name: Persuasive
feat.description: You are skilled at swaying attitudes and intimidating others into your way of thinking.

feat.name: Selective Channeling
feat.description: You can choose whom to affect when you channel energy.

feat.name: Spell Focus (Enchantment)
feat.description: Any spells you cast of your chosen school of magic are more difficult to resist.

ability_object.name: Channel Positive Energy
ability_object.description: You can unleash a wave of positive energy. You must choose to deal 2d6 points of positive energy damage to undead creatures or to heal living creatures of 2d6 points of damage. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a DC 16 Will save to halve the damage. You can use this ability 6 times per day.

ability_object.name: Aura
ability_object.description: A cleric of a chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity has a particularly powerful aura corresponding to the deity's alignment (see the detect evil spell for details).

ability_object.name: Bonus Feat
ability_object.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

ability_object.name: Orisons
ability_object.description: You can prepare a number of orisons, or 0-level spells. These spells are cast like any other spells, but they are not expended when used and may be used again.

ability_object.name: Skilled
ability_object.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at first level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.

ability_object.name: Spontaneous Casting
ability_object.description: You can channel stored spell energy into healing spells that you did not prepare ahead of time. You can "lose" any prepared spell that is not an orison or domain spell in order to cast any cure spell of the same spell level or lower (a cure spell is any spell with "Cure" in its name).

ability_object.name: Sun's Blessing
ability_object.description: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add a +3 bonus to the damage dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their saves when you channel positive energy.

ability_object.name: Touch of Glory
ability_object.description: You can cause your hand to shimmer with divine radiance, allowing you to touch a creature as a standard action and give it a +3 bonus to a single Charisma-based skill check or Charisma ability check. This ability lasts for one hour or until the creature touched elects to apply the bonus to a roll. You can use this ability to grant the bonus 7 times per day.

ability_object.name: Aura of Good
ability_object.description: You project a moderate good aura.

ability_object.name: No Traits
ability_object.description: You do not have any character traits.

ability_object.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
ability_object.description: Clerics are proficient with all simple weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields). Clerics are also proficient with the favored weapon of their deity.

domain.name: Glory
domain.power: You are infused with the glory of the divine, and are a true foe of the undead. In addition, when you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, the save DC to halve the damage is increased by 2.

domain.name: Sun
domain.power: You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.

character.weapon_proficiencies: Bayonet, Blowgun, Cestus, Club, Heavy Crossbow, Light Crossbow, Dagger, Punching Dagger, Dart, Gauntlet, Spiked Gauntlet, Grapple, Javelin, Longspear, Heavy Mace, Light Mace, Mere Club, Morningstar, Quarterstaff, Rock, Scimitar, Shortspear, Sickle, Sling, Spear, Boar Spear, Ray Spells, Touch Spells, Splash Weapon, Stake, Unarmed Strike

spell.name: Bleed
spell.effect: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.
spell.description: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.

spell.name: Create Water
spell.effect: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.
spell.description: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: You detect magical auras.
spell.description: You detect magical auras.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
spell.target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

spell.name: Guidance
spell.effect: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.
spell.description: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.

spell.name: Light
spell.effect: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.
spell.description: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.

spell.name: Mending
spell.effect: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.
spell.target: One object of up to 3 lb.
spell.description: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.

spell.name: Purify Food and Drink
spell.effect: This spell makes spoiled, rotten, diseased, poisonous, or otherwise contaminated food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.
spell.target: 3 cu. ft. of contaminated food and water
spell.description: This spell makes spoiled, rotten, diseased, poisonous, or otherwise contaminated food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.effect: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.
spell.description: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

spell.name: Resistance
spell.effect: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
spell.description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

spell.name: Spark
spell.effect: Ignites flammable objects.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.246

spell.description: Ignites flammable objects.

spell.name: Stabilize
spell.effect: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.
spell.description: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.

spell.name: Virtue
spell.effect: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.
spell.description: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.

spell.name: Ant Haul
spell.effect: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.202

spell.description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

spell.name: Bane
spell.effect: Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt.
spell.description: Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt.

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Bless fills your allies with courage.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

spell.name: Bless Water
spell.effect: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.
spell.description: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.

spell.name: Cause Fear
spell.effect: The affected creature becomes frightened.
spell.target: One living creature with 5 or fewer HD
spell.description: The affected creature becomes frightened.

spell.name: Command
spell.effect: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.
spell.description: You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages
spell.effect: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.
spell.description: You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.

spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+3 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Dancing Lantern
spell.effect: Animates a lantern that follows you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.214

spell.description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

spell.name: Deathwatch
spell.effect: Using the powers of necromancy, you can determine the condition of creatures near death within the spell's range.
spell.description: Using the powers of necromancy, you can determine the condition of creatures near death within the spell's range.

spell.name: Detect Chaos
spell.effect: You can sense the auras of chaotic creatures.
spell.description: You can sense the auras of chaotic creatures.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of evil.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of evil.

spell.name: Detect Good
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of good.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of good.

spell.name: Detect Law
spell.effect: You can sense the auras of lawful creatures.
spell.description: You can sense the auras of lawful creatures.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.effect: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.
spell.description: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.

spell.name: Divine Favor
spell.effect: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.
spell.description: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +(max(1,min(3,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3)))) luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.

spell.name: Doom
spell.effect: This spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become shaken.
spell.description: This spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become shaken.

spell.name: Endure Elements
spell.effect: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.
spell.description: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

spell.name: Endure Elements
spell.effect: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.
spell.description: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

spell.name: Entropic Shield
spell.effect: A magical field appears around you, glowing with a chaotic blast of multicolored hues deflecting incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks.
spell.description: A magical field appears around you, glowing with a chaotic blast of multicolored hues deflecting incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks.

spell.name: Hide from Undead
spell.effect: Undead cannot see, hear, or smell creatures warded by this spell.
spell.description: Undead cannot see, hear, or smell creatures warded by this spell.

spell.name: Inflict Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8+3 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Magic Stone
spell.effect: You transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than sling bullets, so that they strike with great force when thrown or slung.
spell.description: You transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than sling bullets, so that they strike with great force when thrown or slung.

spell.name: Magic Weapon
spell.effect: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.
spell.description: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

spell.name: Obscuring Mist
spell.effect: A misty, stationary vapor arises around you obscuring all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.
spell.target: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius from you, 20 ft. high
spell.description: A misty, stationary vapor arises around you obscuring all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.

spell.name: Protection from Chaos
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Protection from Evil
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Protection from Law
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by lawful creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by lawful creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Remove Fear
spell.effect: You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against fear effects for 10 minutes.
spell.target: 1 creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against fear effects for 10 minutes.

spell.name: Sanctuary
spell.effect: Any opponent attempting to directly attack the warded creature, even with a targeted spell, must attempt a Will save.
spell.description: Any opponent attempting to directly attack the warded creature, even with a targeted spell, must attempt a Will save.

spell.name: Shield of Faith
spell.effect: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.
spell.description: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.

spell.name: Shield of Faith
spell.effect: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.
spell.description: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.

spell.name: Summon Monster I
spell.effect: This spell summons an extraplanar creature.
spell.description: This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

spell.name: Aid
spell.effect: Aid grants +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs fear effects, plus 1d8 + 3 temporary hit points.
spell.description: Aid grants +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs fear effects, plus 1d8 + (min(CASTERLEVEL,10)) temporary hit points.

spell.name: Align Weapon
spell.effect: Align weapon makes a weapon chaotic, evil, good, or lawful, as you choose.
spell.target: Weapon touched or 50 projectiles [all of which must be together at the time of casting]
spell.description: Align weapon makes a weapon chaotic, evil, good, or lawful, as you choose.

spell.name: Augury
spell.effect: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.
spell.description: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.

spell.name: Bear's Endurance
spell.effect: The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina granting the subject a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
spell.description: The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina granting the subject a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

spell.name: Bless Weapon
spell.effect: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.
spell.description: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.

spell.name: Blessing of Courage and Life
spell.effect: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.205

spell.description: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

spell.name: Bull's Strength
spell.effect: The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
spell.description: The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.

spell.name: Calm Emotions
spell.effect: This spell calms agitated creatures.
spell.description: This spell calms agitated creatures.

spell.name: Consecrate
spell.effect: This spell blesses an area with positive energy.
spell.description: This spell blesses an area with positive energy.

spell.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+3 points of damage.
spell.saveinfo: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Darkness
spell.effect: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.
spell.description: This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

spell.name: Delay Poison
spell.effect: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.
spell.description: The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.

spell.name: Eagle's Splendor
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

spell.name: Enthrall
spell.effect: If you have the attention of a group of creatures, you can use this spell to hold them enthralled.
spell.description: If you have the attention of a group of creatures, you can use this spell to hold them enthralled.

spell.name: Find Traps
spell.effect: You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps.
spell.description: You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps.

spell.name: Gentle Repose
spell.effect: You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.
spell.description: You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.

spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge
spell.effect: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.225

spell.description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

spell.name: Grace
spell.effect: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

spell.name: Heat Metal
spell.effect: Heat metal causes metal objects to become red-hot.
spell.target: Metal equipment of one creature per two levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart; or 75 lbs. of metal, all of which must be within a 30-ft. circle
spell.description: Heat metal causes metal objects to become red-hot.

spell.name: Hold Person
spell.effect: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.
spell.description: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.

spell.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 2d8+3 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 2d8+(min(10,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Instant Armor
spell.effect: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.229

spell.description: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

spell.name: Make Whole
spell.effect: This spell functions as mending, except that it repairs 3d6 points of damage when cast on a construct creature.
spell.target: One object of up to 30 cu. ft. or one construct creature of any size
spell.description: This spell functions as mending, except that it repairs (min(5,CASTERLEVEL))d6 points of damage when cast on a construct creature.

spell.name: Owl's Wisdom
spell.effect: The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
spell.description: The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

spell.name: Remove Paralysis
spell.effect: You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.
spell.target: Up to four creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spell.description: You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.

spell.name: Resist Energy
spell.effect: This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.
spell.description: This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.

spell.name: Restoration (Lesser)
spell.effect: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.
spell.description: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.

spell.name: Share Language
spell.effect: Subject understands chosen language.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.243

spell.description: Subject understands chosen language.

spell.name: Shatter
spell.effect: Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature.
spell.target: Or Target 5-ft.-radius spread; or one solid object or one crystalline creature
spell.saveinfo: Will negates (object); Will negates (object) or Fortitude half; see text
spell.description: Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature.

spell.name: Shield Other
spell.effect: This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.
spell.description: This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.

spell.name: Silence
spell.effect: Upon the casting of this spell, complete silence prevails in the affected area.
spell.target: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a creature, object, or point in space
spell.saveinfo: Will negates; see text or none (object)
spell.description: Upon the casting of this spell, complete silence prevails in the affected area.

spell.name: Sound Burst
spell.effect: You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony.
spell.description: You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony.

spell.name: Spiritual Weapon
spell.effect: A weapon made of force appears and attacks foes at a distance, as you direct it, dealing 1d8+1 force damage per hit.
spell.description: A weapon made of force appears and attacks foes at a distance, as you direct it, dealing 1d8+(min(5,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3))) force damage per hit.

spell.name: Status
spell.effect: When you need to keep track of comrades who may get separated, status allows you to mentally monitor their relative positions and general condition.
spell.description: When you need to keep track of comrades who may get separated, status allows you to mentally monitor their relative positions and general condition.

spell.name: Summon Monster II
spell.effect: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.
spell.description: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

spell.name: Undetectable Alignment
spell.effect: An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.
spell.description: An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.

spell.name: Weapon of Awe
spell.effect: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.256

spell.description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

spell.name: Zone of Truth
spell.effect: Creatures within the emanation area [or those who enter it] can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.
spell.description: Creatures within the emanation area (or those who enter it) can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.
